formulas.name: countryCreateQuoteHelpText
formulas.expression: 'Billing Country is pre-selected from the Account associated to the Opportunity. It must be compatible with the Billing Currency (' +{!CurrencyPicklistComponent.selectedCurrency}+ ') and cannot be changed after the Quote is created.'

formulas.name: ServiceEndDateLogic
formulas.expression:
IF( DAY({!Service_Start_Date}) = 31, DATE( YEAR({!Service_Start_Date}) + FLOOR((MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term}-1) / 12), MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term} - 1, 12) + 1, IF( MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term}-1, 12) +1 = 2, IF(MOD(YEAR({!Service_Start_Date}) + FLOOR((MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) +{!Term}) / 12), 4) = 0, 28, 27), IF( OR ( MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term} - 1, 12) + 1 = 1, MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term} - 1, 12) + 1 = 3, MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term} - 1, 12) + 1 = 5, MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term} - 1, 12) + 1 = 7, MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term} - 1, 12) + 1 = 8, MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term} - 1, 12) + 1 = 10, MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term} - 1, 12) + 1 = 12), 30, 29 ) ) ), IF ( DAY({!Service_Start_Date}) = 30, DATE( YEAR({!Service_Start_Date}) + FLOOR((MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term}-1) / 12), MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term} - 1, 12) + 1, IF( MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term}-1, 12) +1 = 2, IF(MOD(YEAR({!Service_Start_Date}) + FLOOR((MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) +{!Term}) / 12), 4) = 0, 28, 27),29 ) ),
IF( AND ( DAY({!Service_Start_Date}) = 29, MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term}-1, 12) +1 = 2 ), DATE( YEAR({!Service_Start_Date}) + FLOOR((MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term}-1) / 12), MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term} - 1, 12) + 1, 27 ),
DATE( YEAR({!Service_Start_Date}) + FLOOR((MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term} - 1) / 12), MOD(MONTH({!Service_Start_Date}) + {!Term} - 1, 12) + 1, DAY({!Service_Start_Date}) )-1 ) ) )

formulas.description: formula field to find out date with last day of current month.
formulas.name: validThruDateDefaultValue
formulas.expression: IF( MONTH( TODAY() ) = 12, DATE( YEAR( TODAY() ), 12, 31 ), DATE( YEAR( TODAY() ), MONTH( TODAY() ) + 1, 1) - 1)

fields.name: CurrencyNotSupportedErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
{!SelectedCurrency} is not supported within {!SelectedCountry}.

Please select a different Billing Country or change the Currency on the Opportunity that is desired.

screens.description: Screen used to create Amend Quote
screens.name: New_Amend_Quote
screens.label: New Amend Quote

validationRule.errorMessage: Contract is required.
Cannot be earlier than today and Cannot exceed Contract's Start and End Dates.
Cannot be earlier than today

fields.name: DisplaytextForAmend
fields.fieldText: Note: The syncing toggle represents the primary Quote that will sync to the Opportunity. If toggled to Active, this Quote will be used to calculate the Opportunity Amount. Only one quote can be synced with the Opportunity at any given time.

screens.description: Screen used to create new Quote.
screens.name: New_Quote
screens.label: New Quote

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter today's date or a future date. Past dated quotes are not supported at this time.
Please enter a value between 1-120. Decimal values are not allowed for Term.

value.stringValue: Billing Currency is pre-selected from the Opportunity Currency, and cannot be changed once the Quote is created. To change, update the Opportunity Currency.

fields.name: ViewCountryCurrencyMapping
fields.fieldText: View Billing Country and Currency Mapping

fields.name: SyncingNote
fields.fieldText: ﻿Note: This toggle annotates the Synced quote. If toggled on, this quote will be used to calculate the Opportunity Amount. Only one quote can be synced with the Opportunity at any given time.

subflows.description: Call the subflow to sync quote to opportunity.
subflows.name: Quote_To_Opportunity_Sync
subflows.label: Quote To Opportunity Sync
